channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description: so i made my server and portforwarded and added port to firewall did the no-ip host al that. me and my friends even played a diff source and it worked. but i got this new source changed the ip to mine and sent it to them but they get to the login screen and click login and it says error coinnecting to server????? pleas help me with this
